alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 6:26AM CDT until October 30 at 7:46AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Kaufman and Ellis Counties. Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Navarro and Henderson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Rosser. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 38.0 feet, Widespread flooding is possible on farm and ranch lands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 28.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 31.0 feet. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 37.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
